response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("Age and Gender", "medium", "Being an 18-year-old male is associated with higher risk due to age and gender-related factors in criminal behavior."),
    ("Race", "low", "Race (White) is not strongly correlated with recidivism risk in a predictive assessment."),
    ("Criminal History", "high", "The fact that he has been arrested and convicted increases his recidivism risk significantly."),
    ("Physical Characteristics", "low", "Height and weight are not relevant factors in criminal risk prediction."),
    ("Marital and Living Status", "medium", "Living alone and never having been married may indicate lower social stability, contributing moderately to risk."),
    ("Educational Attainment", "high", "Lack of a high school diploma or GED is a strong risk factor related to lack of social and economic opportunities."),
    ("Employment History", "high", "Holding only one job during the past year suggests limited employment stability, which is a critical risk factor."),
    ("Substance Use", "low", "No drug use in the past four years is a protective factor, lowering the risk."),
    ("Mental Health (Depression)", "medium", "Feeling down some of the time indicates possible depressive symptoms which can contribute moderately to risk."),
    ("Childhood Environment", "low", "Growing up in a two-parent household in an urban setting is generally a protective factor, reducing risk."),
    ("Religiosity", "medium", "Lack of a belief in a higher power may be associated with lower community or social controls, increasing modest risk.")
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 75
}

risk_factors: Being an 18-year-old male is associated with higher risk due to age and gender-related factors in criminal behavior.
Race (White) is not strongly correlated with recidivism risk in a predictive assessment.
The fact that he has been arrested and convicted increases his recidivism risk significantly.
Height and weight are not relevant factors in criminal risk prediction.
Living alone and never having been married may indicate lower social stability, contributing moderately to risk.
Lack of a high school diploma or GED is a strong risk factor related to lack of social and economic opportunities.
Holding only one job during the past year suggests limited employment stability, which is a critical risk factor.
No drug use in the past four years is a protective factor, lowering the risk.
Feeling down some of the time indicates possible depressive symptoms which can contribute moderately to risk.
Growing up in a two-parent household in an urban setting is generally a protective factor, reducing risk.
Lack of a belief in a higher power may be associated with lower community or social controls, increasing modest risk.

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is an 18-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 1 time and has been convicted. He is 6 feet 0 inches and weighs 145 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He does not have a high school diploma or GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has not used any drugs in the past four years and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 3, in an urban area. He considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
